title: What's COHP?
content: Company of Heroes Pixel (COHP) is a real-time strategy mod based on the PC game Company of Heroes 2. Players command one of five WWII factions—currently the British Forces, the Wehrmacht, the Soviet Union, and the Oberkommando West—and lead their armies to destroy enemy strongholds or capture control points.

title: About Dowload
content: Here are several ways to get the latest version of the mod. Below, we've listed three of the most convenient.

title: Tips Before Battle
content: COHP is quiet different from many other mods, so it's better to takes a few minutes to understand the game's rule. Here is a few tips you need to know before you start a game.

title: Map Introduction
content: Greetings, commanders! In this section of tutorial, we will bring you the intelligences of all of the 7 maps in this mod.

title: Victory Condition
content: Now we can explore the basic gaming method of the module. This section of tutorial contains an introduction to the most basic mechanisms and victory conditions in the game.

title: Resource System
content: Resource System is an essential part in all RTS games. In this section you will learn the main three types of resources in COHP, as well as concepts such as maintenance fees and population limits.

title: Infantry Mechanism I
content: Infantry is the basic unit in COHP. This section will show you the damage mechanism, hit rate mechanism, evasion rate mechanism, suppression mechanism of infantry units in the mod.

title: Infantry Mechanism II
content: Infantry is the basic unit in COHP. This section will show you the seize mechanism, reinforcement mechanism, treatment mechanism, veterancy system mechanism, cover system as well as retreat function of infantry units in the mod.

title: Armour Mechanism
content: This section introduces the armor mechanism and module system of armor units in the mod.

title: The Finale
content: This is the last section of the tutorial. Congratulations, commanders! You have graduated from COHP Military Academy, and now you can lead your soldiers to participate in battles and witness the bloody and stormy times of 80 years ago.
